title: The fight for your rental deposit

title: Westerville Web: It's okay to be bad
description: What if you stopped worrying about technology, design, and scalability and instead shipped your side-projects? Whether youâ€™re a developer or not, everyone has ideas for the next big thing. Learn how to stop adding to your idea graveyard by not sweating the small stuff and instead using the tools you know to build and release products (even if they are a bit rough around the edges).
